item.title: Video editor for paid ads - Upwork
item.description:
We are needing a video editor that can edit videos for paid social media ads. This person must show proof of past vidoes they have edited. Having a creative mindset if crucial. Must be top of the line editing.

Hourly Range: $44.00-$66.00
Posted On: June 28, 2024 21:57 UTC
Category: Video Editing
Skills:Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video, Video Post-Editing
Skills: Video Editing, Adobe Premiere Pro, Adobe After Effects, Testimonial Video, Video Post-Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
